title: Find the adjoint of a matrix
contentHtml:
Write a program to find the adjoint of a matrix

The adjoint of a square matrix A is the transpose of the matrix of cofactors of A. The adjoint of a matrix A is denoted as A*.

Input  :
1 2 3
4 5 6
7 8 9

Output :
[[-3, 6, -3], [6, -12, 6], [-3, 6, -3]]

## Write a program to find the adjoint of a matrix

The adjoint of a square matrix A is the transpose of the matrix of cofactors of A. The adjoint of a matrix A is denoted as A<sup>\*</sup>.

```
Input  :
1 2 3
4 5 6
7 8 9

Output :
[[-3, 6, -3], [6, -12, 6], [-3, 6, -3]]
```
